analyzer/src/data_quality/MDQ_TDCCheck.cpp

00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003 Name:         MDQ_TDCCheck
00004 Created by:   Andrew Edmonds
00005 
00006 Contents:     hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc
00007               - plots the number of muSc hits as seen in the TDC (parameter = 6011)
00008 
00009               hDQ_TDCCheck_muScA
00010               - plots the number of muScA hits as seen in the TDC (parameter = 6002)
00011 
00012               hDQ_TDCCheck_muPC
00013               - plots the number of muPC hits as seen in the TDC (4001 <= parameter <= 4074)
00014 
00015               hDQ_TDCCheck_Unknown
00016               - plots the number of hits in the TDC with any other parameter
00017 
00018               hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_time
00019               - plots the time of the muSc hits as seen in the TDC
00020 
00021               hDQ_TDCCheck_TDiff
00022               - plots the time difference between muSc hits in the TDC and the BU CAEN
00023 
00024 \********************************************************************/
00025

00090 INT MDQ_TDCCheck_init()
00091 {
00092     // See if the DataQuality_LowLevel/ directory already exists
00093   if (!gDirectory->Cd("DataQuality_LowLevel")) {
00094     
00095     std::string dir_name("DataQuality_LowLevel/");
00096     gDirectory->mkdir(dir_name.c_str());
00097     gDirectory->Cd(dir_name.c_str());
00098   }
00099 
00100   // Create some histograms
00101   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc = new TH1F("hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc", "Number of Hits in TDC (muSc)", 3,0,3);
00102   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("muSc");
00103   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Hits");
00104 
00105   hDQ_TDCCheck_muScA = new TH1F("hDQ_TDCCheck_muScA", "Number of Hits in TDC (muScA)", 3,0,3);
00106   hDQ_TDCCheck_muScA->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("muScA");
00107   hDQ_TDCCheck_muScA->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Hits");
00108 
00109   hDQ_TDCCheck_muPC = new TH1F("hDQ_TDCCheck_muPC", "Number of Hits in TDC (muPC)", 3,0,3);
00110   hDQ_TDCCheck_muPC->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("muPC");
00111   hDQ_TDCCheck_muPC->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Hits");
00112 
00113   hDQ_TDCCheck_Unknown = new TH1F("hDQ_TDCCheck_Unknown", "Number of Hits in TDC (Unknown)", 7000,0,7000);
00114   hDQ_TDCCheck_Unknown->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("TDC Parameter");
00115   hDQ_TDCCheck_Unknown->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Hits");
00116 
00117   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_time = new TH1F("hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_time", "Time of TDC Hits in muSc", 1200,0,120e6);
00118   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_time->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time of muSc Hit [ns]");
00119   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_time->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Hits");
00120 
00121   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_rate = new TH1F("hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_rate", "Rate of TDC Hits in muSc", 3,0,3);
00122   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_rate->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("muSc");
00123   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_rate->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Rate of muSc Hit [s^-1]");
00124 
00125   hDQ_TDCCheck_TDiff = new TH1F("hDQ_TDCCheck_TDiff", "Time difference between muSc hit in TDC and BU", 10000,-5000,5000);
00126   hDQ_TDCCheck_TDiff->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Difference of muSc Hits (BU CAEN - TDC)");
00127   hDQ_TDCCheck_TDiff->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Hits");
00128 
00129   gDirectory->Cd("/MidasHists/");
00130   return SUCCESS;
00131 }
00132 
00135 INT MDQ_TDCCheck_eor(INT run_number) {
00136 
00137   // Get the run duration to scale the histogram
00138   HNDLE hDB, hKey;
00139   char keyName[200];
00140 
00141   if(cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL) != CM_SUCCESS){
00142     printf("Warning: Could not connect to ODB database!\n");
00143     return false;
00144   }
00145 
00146   sprintf(keyName, "/Runinfo/Start time binary");
00147   if(db_find_key(hDB,0,keyName, &hKey) != SUCCESS){
00148     printf("Warning: Could not find key %s\n", keyName);
00149     return false;
00150   }
00151   KEY start_time_key;
00152   if(db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &start_time_key) != DB_SUCCESS){
00153     printf("Warning: Could not find key %s\n", keyName);
00154     return false;
00155   }
00156   DWORD StartTimes[start_time_key.num_values];
00157   int size = sizeof(StartTimes);
00158   if(db_get_value(hDB, 0, keyName, StartTimes, &size, TID_DWORD, 0) != DB_SUCCESS){
00159     printf("Warning: Could not retrieve values for key %s\n", keyName);
00160     return false;
00161   }
00162 
00163   sprintf(keyName, "/Runinfo/Stop time binary");
00164   if(db_find_key(hDB,0,keyName, &hKey) != SUCCESS){
00165     printf("Warning: Could not find key %s\n", keyName);
00166     return false;
00167   }
00168   KEY stop_time_key;
00169   if(db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &stop_time_key) != DB_SUCCESS){
00170     printf("Warning: Could not find key %s\n", keyName);
00171     return false;
00172   }
00173   DWORD StopTimes[stop_time_key.num_values];
00174   size = sizeof(StopTimes);
00175   if(db_get_value(hDB, 0, keyName, StopTimes, &size, TID_DWORD, 0) != DB_SUCCESS){
00176     printf("Warning: Could not retrieve values for key %s\n", keyName);
00177     return false;
00178   }
00179 
00180   int duration = StopTimes[0] - StartTimes[0]; // length of run in seconds (checked against run #2600)
00181   
00182   hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_rate->Scale(1.0/duration);
00183 
00184   return SUCCESS;
00185 }
00186 
00189 INT MDQ_TDCCheck(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00190 {
00191         // Get the event number
00192         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00193 
00194         // Some typedefs
00195         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00196         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00197         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00198 
00199         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00200         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00201         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00202                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00203 
00204         // Get a pointer to the hit data in the TDC
00205         // NB copied and modified from MMuSCAnalysisC.cpp
00206         channel_hit *hit_bank;
00207         int hit_bank_size = bk_locate(pevent, "HITS", (DWORD *) &hit_bank);
00208         hit_bank_size = hit_bank_size * sizeof(DWORD) / sizeof(channel_hit);
00209 
00210         // At the moment just loop through the hits and print the information
00211         // Parameter values have been obtained from MMuSCAnalysisMQL.cpp and MMuPC1AnalysisMQL.cpp
00212         for (int i = 0; i < hit_bank_size; ++i) {
00213           if (hit_bank[i].parameter == 6011) {
00214             //      printf("muSC hit! Hit #%d: time = %f, parameter = %d\n", i, hit_bank[i].time, hit_bank[i].parameter);
00215             hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc->Fill(1);
00216             hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_time->Fill(hit_bank[i].time);
00217             hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc_rate->Fill(1);
00218 
00219             // Plot the time difference between the time as given by the TDC and as given by the BU CAEN
00220             std::string detname = "muSc";
00221             std::string bankname = gSetup->GetBankName(detname);
00222             std::vector<TPulseIsland*> theMuScPulses = pulse_islands_map[bankname];
00223 
00224             // Loop over the TPulseIslands and plot the histogram
00225             for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator pulseIter = theMuScPulses.begin(); pulseIter != theMuScPulses.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00226 
00227               // Get the timestamp of the TPI in ns
00228               int time_stamp = (*pulseIter)->GetTimeStamp();
00229               double clock_tick_in_ns = (*pulseIter)->GetClockTickInNs();
00230               double block_time = time_stamp * clock_tick_in_ns;
00231 
00232               hDQ_TDCCheck_TDiff->Fill(block_time - hit_bank[i].time);
00233             }
00234           }
00235 
00236           else if (hit_bank[i].parameter == 6002)
00237             //      printf("muSCA hit! Hit #%d: time = %f, parameter = %d\n", i, hit_bank[i].time, hit_bank[i].parameter);
00238             hDQ_TDCCheck_muScA->Fill(1);
00239 
00240           else if (hit_bank[i].parameter >= 4001 && hit_bank[i].parameter <= 4074)
00241             //      printf("muPC hit! Hit #%d: time = %f, parameter = %d\n", i, hit_bank[i].time, hit_bank[i].parameter);
00242             hDQ_TDCCheck_muPC->Fill(1);
00243           else
00244             //      printf("Unknown hit! Hit #%d: time = %f, parameter = %d\n", i, hit_bank[i].time, hit_bank[i].parameter);
00245             hDQ_TDCCheck_Unknown->Fill(hit_bank[i].parameter);
00246         }
00247 
00248         return SUCCESS;
00249 }
